Dear {!PAYBASE2__Payment__c.PAYCP2__Name_On_Card__c},
Thank you for your payment for NCS (National Citizen Service). We can confirm that we have received {!PAYBASE2__Payment__c.PAYBASE2__Amount__c}.
Please note that payment does not guarantee a place on NCS. Your teenager's application is currently being processed. We’ll be in touch soon with an update or to let you know if we need any more information.
In the meantime, if you would like more information or have any questions, please visit questions.ncsthechallenge.org or contact us on 0203 542 2400. We will be happy to help.
For your records, your transaction ID is: {!PAYBASE2__Payment__c.PAYCP2__Vendor_Transaction_Id__c} The status of this transaction is: {!PAYBASE2__Payment__c.PAYBASE2__Status__c}
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Service The Challenge (largest provider of NCS)
